QuestData.Title: Low Turnip Turnout
QuestData.Description: Your help here is appreciated, $n. I'd like to give you another job, if you're interested.$b$bMy son, Ang, runs the small farm just down this hill. He should have brought me some fruits and vegetables this morning, but I haven't seen him all day.$b$bWould you go down there and see what's going on?
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find Ang Thunderfoot at the Thunderfoot Farm in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: Wha-? Who the...? My father sent you?$b$bPshh... he can be so nosy sometimes. I have everything under control here.
